languages.text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} remains until the end of combat. Stacks.
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响盟友时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响盟友时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} каждый раз, когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} персонажа воздействует на союзника. Этот эффект суммируется и действует до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} каждый раз, когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} персонажа воздействует на союзника. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} суммируется и действует до конца боя.

Дает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} каждый раз, когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} персонажа воздействует на союзника. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} суммируется и действует до конца боя.

languages.text: 使用者は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方に影響を及ぼすたびに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を5獲得する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は戦闘終了時まで続く。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方に影響を及ぼすたびに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を5獲得する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}は戦闘終了時まで続く。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: El portador obtiene +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} cada vez que sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} afectan a un aliado. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} dura hasta el final del combate. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} cada vez que sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} afectan a un aliado. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} dura hasta el final del combate. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, jedes mal wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} einen Verbündeten beeinflussen. Dieser Effekt dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Addiert sich.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, jedes mal wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} einen Verbündeten beeinflussen. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Addiert sich.

languages.text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} chaque fois que ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} affectent un allié. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} reste en vigueur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} chaque fois que ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} affectent un allié. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} reste en vigueur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
